SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Migrate to sObject Configurations (Enforced)

Ensure that you’ve migrated your storefront’s metadata to the required format. This release removes the Migrate Page Settings option from CC Admin, and requires all solutions to migrate their legacy page settings to sObject configuration data.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: The option to migrate legacy page settings to sObject configurations has existed in the managed package since CloudCraze 4.4. Most storefronts have already completed this migration. If you haven’t migrated page settings yet, make sure that you do so before you upgrade the managed package. Complete the steps in:

(PDF) Migrate from Page Settings to sObject Configurations

IMPORTANT The PDF content was authored for older versions of the managed package and doesn't necessarily represent the most recent version of B2B Commerce for Visualforce. This content is updated infrequently, and only for resolving critical inaccuracies or changes in behavior.

title: Migrating to sObject Configurations
